query: SELECT id, slug, title, LENGTH(metaDescription) as meta_len, LENGTH(excerpt) as excerpt_len, status FROM resources WHERE status = 'published' LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT id, slug, title, LENGTH(metaDescription) as meta_len, LENGTH(excerpt) as excerpt_len, status FROM resources WHERE status = 'published' LIMIT 10

rows.title: Peak Splitting in HPLC: Diagnosis and Ultimate Solutions

The Signal-to-Noise Battle: 5 Tips to Increase HPLC Detection Sensitivity Without Sacrificing Resolution
